product.name: Lightdot 3-Light Bathroom Vanity Light, 16.5IN Modern Bathroom Light Fixtures with Clear Glass Waterproof Shades, Rust-Proof White Vanity Lights Over Mirror for Living Room Kitchen Hallway
product.description:
Q1：Are you worried that the product will be damaged due to environmental factors during use?
A1：The base of our bathroom vanity light is made of metal material to protect itself from moisture, rust and corrosion.
Q2：What if the product is damaged？
A2：Our bathroom light fixture adopted strong glass shades that won't shatter easily, rugged and anti-glare. If the product is damaged, we will resend you a new one.
Q3: Is this vanity light dimmable?
A3: Our vanity light is compatible with dimmer bulbs and switches. If you are using a dimmable E26 bulb, it can be dimmed. (Bulbs and dimmer switch are not included.）
product.bullet_points:
• 【Modern Minimalist Design】Lightdot 3-Light bathroom light fixture featuring 3 clear glass shades integrated with horizonta matte frame, which delivers shadow-free illumination perfect for your bathroom. Single and double lights are suitable for one meter long and two meter long mirrors respectively. The thickened metal construction with anti-oxidation coating resists humidity and fingerprints.
• 【Standard E26 Base】This modern vanity light compatible with any E26 base bulb (Incandescent, CFL, halogen, LED bulbs suitable, Max 60W for each bulb, Bulbs are not Included). Also fully dimmable when used with a dimming bulbs and switch, so that you can choose different style bulbs and control desired brightness.
• 【Wide Application】Lightdot bathroom vanity light over mirror can be mounted facing upward or downward according to your needs, no matter how can emit aesthetic and ample glow to create a beautiful lighting atmosphere. Perfect wall lamp for bathroom mirror, doorway, entryway, closet, living room, mirror cabinets, dressing table, porch, and corridor.
• 【Easy to Install】This vanity light using wall mounted and hardwired design, size: 16.5''x 5''x 9''. All mounting hardware and accessories required for installation are included in the package, just need to connect the wire and assemble the lampshade only.
• 【5-Years Assurance】Lightdot backed by our industry-leading assurance (3x longer than competitors), including new unit for oxidation, wiring issues, or hardware defects. 24/7 US-based support with <4hr support time. With over 15 years of dedication to crafting high-quality, high-performance products, we stand behind our products and offerings with 100% support.
